title: The Baseball Game
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: What can you see at a baseball game? In The Baseball Game, students will read about different things they might see at a baseball game. Detailed photographs and the use of the high-frequency word this support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to classify information as well as to ask and answer questions to better understand the text.
meta: base, baseball, bat, helmet, team, uniform
Ask and answer questions to better understand text
Classify Information : Classify information in a text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this
